inputs.name: Configure WMI credentials
inputs.help_text: Specify the domain administrator or user with administrator credentials to fetch accurate endpoint information from remote desktops running Microsoft Windows.

inputs.name: Use Active Directory server credentials
inputs.help_text: Use existing Active Directory server credentials.

inputs.name: Profile all discovered devices using WMI
inputs.help_text: If the number of discovered devices exceeds 1000, it is recommended to add subnets manually to scan only Windows devices.

inputs.name: Allow deep scan
inputs.help_text: Control the level of information fetched from the endpoint remotely through WMI. Deep Scan includes information on ports, processes, and security product details such as product version, signature version, and signature date attributes.

inputs.name: Endpoint IP or hostname
inputs.help_text: Enter the Endpoint IP or hostname to test the credentials.

inputs.name: Authentication Method
inputs.help_text: Select Password to authenticate using administrator credentials or Public key to authenticate using RSA credentials.

inputs.name: Profile all discovered devices using SSH
inputs.help_text: If the number of discovered devices exceeds 1000, it is recommended to add subnets manually to scan only Windows devices.

inputs.name: Community List Names
inputs.help_text: Enter the possible community list names, separated by commas, to collect device attributes for the endpoints monitored through SNMP.

inputs.name: Profile all discovered devices using SNMP (Host)
inputs.help_text: If the number of discovered devices exceeds 1000, it is recommended to add subnets manually to scan only Windows devices.

inputs.name: Polling Interval
inputs.help_text: Set the polling interval in minutes. By default, the poll interval is set to 720 minutes.

inputs.name: Subnets
inputs.help_text: Enter one or more subnets, select to include or exclude the listed collectors like SSH, WMI, SNMP (HOST), and NMAP.

actions.description: Trigger a scan instantly on the selected subnets for selected collectors.

constraints: If the number of discovered devices exceeds 1000, it is recommended to add subnets manually to scan only Windows devices.
For on-demand scan, NMAP is supported for devices in the same subnet as PPS.
